description:
Kagetora`s Eevee was briefly seen battling against Ilima`s Eevee in a parking lot. It ended up losing the battle and Kagetora gave Ilima an Eevium Z as a reward for defeating Eevee.
Ash Ketchum wanted to see what Eevee`s Z-Move was like so he challenged Ilima to a battle. Ilima`s Eevee was up against Pikachu but before the battle started Skull Gang showed up. During the battle against the Skull Gang, Vaporeon, Umbreon, Espeon, Leafeon, Sylveon, Glaceon, Flareon, and Jolteon showed up at the school battleground when it used Extreme Evoboost. Ash thought it was an awesome Z-Move.
name: Eievui (Ilima)
